edr_powershell: Confirm parent process and command line.
Collect volatile artifacts (process list, network conns).
Block indicators on EDR/SOAR and notify user.
phishing_attachment: Quarantine the email and similar messages.
Reset user credentials if any credential prompts clicked.
Hunt for recipients who engaged; guide password reset.
Update email security rules for lookalike domains.
after_hours_admin_login: Verify if admin had planned maintenance.
Check geolocation and source IP reputation.
Review change records; monitor for lateral movement.
Enforce MFA and conditional access if gaps found.
Document exception or create incident if suspicious.

queries.siem_failed_then_success: index=auth sourcetype=windows:security user=svc_admin | transaction user maxspan=10m | where failed>=5 AND success=1
queries.edr_child_process: DeviceProcessEvents | where InitiatingProcessFileName in ('WINWORD.EXE','EXCEL.EXE') and FileName == 'powershell.exe'
